laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile test (Illumigene DNA amplification assay)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. (Reference Range-Negative)

Large inflammatory collection centered in the right lower quadrant, approximately 6.4 x 4.0 cm, likely representing perforated appendicitis with abscess formation. No pneumoperitoneum. Small amount of adjacent low density free pelvic fluid.
